name: Gates Cambridge Scholarship
description: The Gates Cambridge Scholarship programme was established in October 2000 by a donation of US$210m from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation to the University of Cambridge; this is the largest ever single donation to a UK university.

name: Fulbright Foreign Student Program
description: The Fulbright Foreign Student Program enables graduate students, young professionals and artists from abroad to study and conduct research in the United States.

name: Chevening Scholarship
description: Chevening is the UK government's international awards programme aimed at developing global leaders. Offers a unique opportunity for future leaders, influencers, and decision-makers.

name: Rhodes Scholarship
description: The Rhodes Scholarship is the oldest (first awarded in 1902) and perhaps most prestigious international scholarship programme, enabling outstanding young people to study at Oxford.

name: Google Generation Scholarship
description: The Google Generation Scholarship was established to help aspiring computer scientists excel in technology and become leaders in the field.

name: DAAD Scholarship
description: DAAD scholarships offer foreign graduates from development and newly industrialised countries opportunities to study in Germany.

name: Eiffel Excellence Scholarship
description: The Eiffel Excellence Scholarship Program was established by the French Ministry for Europe and Foreign Affairs to attract top foreign students to French universities.

name: Schwarzman Scholars
description: Designed to prepare the next generation of global leaders, Schwarzman Scholars is the first scholarship created to respond to the geopolitical landscape of the 21st century.

name: Erasmus Mundus Joint Masters
description: Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees are prestigious, integrated, international study programmes delivered by consortia of higher education institutions.

name: Australian Awards Scholarships
description: Australia Awards Scholarships are long-term development awards administered by the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade.

name: MEXT Scholarship Japan
description: The Japanese Government offers scholarships through MEXT for international students to study undergraduate and graduate programs in Japan.

name: Knight-Hennessy Scholarship
description: Knight-Hennessy Scholars develops a community of future global leaders to address the world's complex challenges through collaboration and innovation.

name: Vanier Canada Graduate Scholarships
description: The Vanier CGS program aims to attract and retain world-class doctoral students and to establish Canada as a global centre of excellence in research.

name: Swiss Government Excellence Scholarship
description: Swiss Government Excellence Scholarships are provided by the Federal Commission for Scholarships for Foreign Students.

name: Aga Khan Foundation Scholarship
description: The Aga Khan Foundation provides scholarships for postgraduate studies to outstanding students from developing countries who have no other means of financing.

name: Microsoft Research PhD Fellowship
description: The Microsoft Research PhD Fellowship is a two-year fellowship for doctoral students at North American universities.

name: Facebook (Meta) Fellowship
description: The Meta Fellowship is designed to encourage and support promising doctoral students engaged in innovative research in computer science.

name: Commonwealth Scholarship
description: Commonwealth Scholarships are for students from Commonwealth countries to pursue postgraduate study in the UK.

name: Rotary Peace Fellowship
description: Each year, Rotary awards up to 130 fellowships for dedicated leaders from around the world to study at one of Rotary's peace centers.

name: KGSP Korean Government Scholarship
description: The Korean Government Scholarship Program enables international students to conduct advanced studies at higher educational institutions in Korea.

name: Coca-Cola Scholars Program
description: The Coca-Cola Scholars Program scholarship is an achievement-based scholarship awarded to graduating high school seniors.

name: Dell Scholars Program
description: The Dell Scholars Program recognizes students who have overcome significant obstacles to pursue their education.

name: McKinsey Achievement Gap Initiative
description: McKinsey provides scholarships and mentorship to help high-achieving students from underrepresented backgrounds.

name: Clarendon Scholarship Oxford
description: The Clarendon Fund is a prestigious University of Oxford graduate scholarship scheme.

name: Stanford Reliance Dhirubhai Fellowship
description: The Reliance Dhirubhai Fellowship covers the full tuition cost for MBA students at Stanford GSB from India.
